original: Bolstered by Johnathan's hunting party, Sofia's holdout eked out a modest subsistence within their new sanctum.  Despite endless monsters and anomalies to combat, and few allies they could count on, they languished on with characteristic stubbornness.  "So long as the Sun shines upon the Earth" as their tenets state, as it had been and as it shall be…
translation: 在约翰纳森的狩猎队的支持下，索菲亚的据点在他们的新圣所中勉强维持生存。尽管他们需要对抗无尽的怪物和异常，而且他们可以依赖的盟友寥寥无几，但他们仍然倔强的坚持下去。正如他们的信条所述，“只要太阳还照耀着地球”，就像过去一样，未来也将如此……

translation: 随着物资日益耗尽，且毫无援军希望，索菲亚的狩猎小队最终不得不弃守那座古老的教堂。这支“净化之焰”最后的已知残部终究未能抵挡住浩劫的恐怖，与他们曾经追猎的那些存在一同走向了相同的命运。

original: Over time people flocked to the sanctum, errant hunting parties as well as allies, both old and new, turning the rural church into a fortified oasis in a ruined world.  While the harsh reality of post-apocalyptic life would remain, new threats and new setbacks a feature of daily life, the Cleansing Flame would become a powerful ally for the survivors of New England.  There they preserved what they had learned, even the knowledge of the arcane orders they once clashed with, in the hope of passing down this knowledge to begin again…
translation: 随着时间推移，人们纷纷聚集到这座圣堂，包括流离失所的狩猎队伍以及新老盟友，使得原本偏远的乡村教堂在废墟世界中成为一座坚固的绿洲。尽管后末日生活的严酷现实依旧，日常生活中充斥着新的威胁与挫折，但“净化之焰”却成为新英格兰幸存者们强有力的伙伴。在那里，他们保存了所学的一切知识，甚至是曾与之冲突的奥术派系的知识，寄望将这些知识传承下去，以便从头再来……

original: The sanctum grew from a few arcanists huddled in an old church, to an outpost of monster hunters bolstering the communities around it.  Preserving knowledge and teaching it to those who sought them out, they augmented the old arcane texts with new knowledge.  While they could never truly mend the wounds in the Veil, they had learned a way to salve those wounds as their rivals the Keepers once sought.  Whether it would be enough to ensure humanity's survival, it would take generations to be certain.  But they had found their purpose.  Of many faiths, united in purpose, against all threats from the Beyond.
translation: 圣堂最初由几位秘术师聚集在一座古老的教堂里发展起来，逐渐演变为一处守护者据点，为周边社区提供怪物猎人的支援。他们致力于保存知识，并将其传授给寻求帮助的人们，用新知丰富古老的奥术文献。虽然他们无法彻底修复帷幕上的裂痕，但他们已学会如昔日的守誓者所追求的那样，为这些伤口敷上疗愈之药。至于这是否足以确保人类的存续，还需要几代人的努力才能确定。但无论如何，他们找到了自己的使命：来自不同信仰，因同一目标团结一心，对抗来自彼端的一切威胁。

Though the lands around their new sanctum became known as a safe haven, they remained guarded with the secrets they had learned. Through their clashes with unsuspecting scavengers, the sight of gilded scales and metal masks once again struck fear into those caught dabbling in what was forbidden.

original: "Project Kairos Update: It took a lot of red tape, but we confirmed that there's a very faint, measurable long-term effect caused by multiple instances of spatial manipulation.  A slight decrease in the energy needed for a microportal to overcome resistance and begin manifesting.  We've been able to rule out variation in atmospheric conditions and resistance changes in the machine.  Our current research indicates this may amplify the ripple effects from spatial manipulation, but electromagnetic containment allows the ripple effect to be nullified.  Further research is required before we can report our findings, but there are growing concerns that time may be of the essence."
translation: “Kairos项目更新：尽管花了很多时间在繁文缛节上，但我们确认，有一个非常微弱的，可测量的长期影响所造成的空间操纵的多个实例。微气孔克服阻力并开始显现所需能量的轻微减少。我们已经排除了大气条件的变化和机器阻力的变化。我们目前的研究表明，这可能会放大空间操纵的涟漪效应，但电磁遏制允许消除涟漪效应。在我们报告研究结果之前，还需要进一步的研究，但越来越多的人担心，时间可能至关重要。”

original: "Project Kairos Update: The dimensional lens array should be discharged once every 24 hours so long as the project is to continue operation.  Daily test firings should continue until local spatial fluctuations normalize.  If all goes as planned, we just need to hold out for a month and it will be safe to continue to Phase 2.  Our hypothesis is that the ripple energy of a microportal, once contained, can be manipulated via other anomalous principles we've been researching.  This might enable directing that energy to somewhere that has suffered a dimensional fatigue incident, which may increase the resistance back to a level that would no longer allow for a portal to be self-sustaining."
translation: “Kairos项目更新:只要项目继续运行，维镜阵列就应该每24小时放电一次。每天的试射应该持续到局部空间波动正常化。如果一切按计划进行，我们只需要坚持一个月，就可以安全地继续进行第二阶段。我们的假设是，微区域的波纹能量一旦被抑制，就可以通过我们一直在研究的其他异常原理来操纵。这可能会将能量引向遭受空间疲劳事件的某个地方，也可能会将阻力增加到门户无法自我维持的水平。”

original: "Security Update: Additional security assets have been prepared in Sector Three in preparation for potential consequences, in response to concerns that a dimensional fatigue event may be the cause of the other facilities falling silent.  An autonomous military exosuit, designation Z-07, codename "Strigoi" has had its first successful test. original: (( Unfortunately, due to a mistake on the part of the mod author, old versions of this NPC were set to start with Sofia's first mission instead of the inaccessible dummy mission created for them.  This was supposed to allow old saves to be able to immediately make use of the new mission chain being added, but bungling it means versions from old saves cannot correctly grab the new mission chain.  This message is here to inform the player why their old version of this NPC still lacks accessible missions. ))
translation: （不幸的是，由于模组作者的一个错误，这个NPC的旧版本设置为从索菲亚的第一个任务开始，而不是为他们创建的无法访问的虚拟任务。这本应允许旧的保存能够立即使用新的任务链被添加，但失败意味着旧的保存版本不能正确地抓住新的任务链。这条信息是为了告诉玩家为什么他们的旧版NPC仍然缺少可访问的任务。）

original:
A book depicting six strange symbols on the cover.  The text uses mythological concepts and metaphors to disguise magical formulae, concealing its knowledge within stories of an otherworldly pantheon.
"Mother of the sun.  Maiden of moonlit storms.  Order woven into earth itself.  Chaos reveling in nature.  Four horsemen embodied as one.  Defiance and strife.  You are the keepers of all I know..."
translation:
一本书，封面上描绘了六个奇怪符号。通篇使用各种神话概念和隐喻来掩饰魔法配方，将知识隐藏在一个异界万神殿的故事中.
“太阳之母，月光风暴女神，与大地共存的秩序之神，在自然中欢愉的混沌之神，四位领导者合而为一，反抗与斗争。你是我所知道的一切的守护者... ”

original:
A book describing several otherworldly creatures and their origins, or at least conjecture on those origins.  Stranger still, it describes experiments in summoning and  ...controlling them?
"In the absence of an adequate catalyst, those who dwell Beyond are not easily called into service.  What slips through the cracks most readily is a mere shadow, a reflection of shadows even, given form that can be tamed..."
translation:
一本描述了几种异界生物及其起源的书，或者至少是对这些起源的推测。更奇怪的是，它描述了召唤和……操控它们的实验？
"在缺乏充分的条件下，那些居住在彼岸的存在不容易被召唤到现世中来。最容易溜出缝隙的只是一道投影，甚至只是投影的反射，被赋予了可以被驯服的形态…"

original:
A book discussing the histories of a few peculiar cults and religious orders, and their conflicts during the years up until shortly before the cataclysm.  It describes a number of peculiar rituals and concepts based on the philosophies of the major groups mentioned, along with musing on their respective strengths and flaws.
"Athame, hammer, and chalice.  Stalking and warring over trifling powers, as the Blind World pursued the End of All.  All things are, and shall be, as was written..."
translation:
一本书讨论了一些特殊的邪教和宗教秩序的历史，以及它们在大灾难前几年的冲突。它描述了一些特殊的仪式和概念的基础上所提到的主要群体的哲学，以及思考他们各自的优点和缺点。
“仪式刀，锤子和圣杯。为了琐碎的权力而纠缠和斗争，如同盲目的世界追求一切的终结。一切事物都是，将来也将是，正如所写的那样……”

original:

"Athame, hammer, and chalice.  Stalking and warring over trifling powers, as the Blind World pursued the End of All.  All things are, and shall be, as was written…"
translation:
这本书讨论了一些特殊的邪教和宗教秩序的历史，以及直到大灾难前不久的那些年中之间的冲突。它描述了一些基于所述的团体的哲学的奇特仪式和概念，以及对其各自优势和缺陷的思考。
“匕首、锤子和圣杯。在盲目的世界追求一切终结的过程中，为微不足道的世俗权力而隐藏和争斗。一切事物都是，并且将会是，正如所写的那样…”

original:
A book written by some esoteric religious order, dedicated to destroying the otherworldly things intruding upon this realm.  The tools of their trade rely on a sanctioned form of magic, using "consecrated" essence they deemed safe to use.
"To bring justice to those who would endanger humanity, if we must.  To mend the growing wound In The Veil Between Worlds, if we can.  To guard and guide, so that a dangerous path may be avoided, so we shall.  So long as the Sun shines upon the Earth."
translation:
一本由一些神秘的宗教团体写的书，致力于摧毁侵入这个领域的异界事物。他们使用他们认为是神圣的“魔法”的本质。
“为那些危害人类的人伸张正义，这是我们必须做的事。如果可以的话，去修补世界之间日益增长的伤口。我们将守卫和引导，以避免危险的道路。只要太阳仍然照耀大地。”

A book written in dark, brown ink that almost resembles dried blood.  It illustrates several painful-looking rituals for drawing powerful energy from the blood of living creatures, the practices of an order of blood mages.
"There is power in life itself.  There is a struggle, turmoil and chaos in it as well.  To follow The Path requires making proper use of said disharmony, even as one draws power from life..."
translation:
一本用深褐色墨水写的书，几乎像干涸的血迹。它展示了几种看起来痛苦的仪式，从生物的血液中汲取强大的能量，这是一个血法师的修行方式。
“生命本身就有力量。其中也有斗争、动乱和混乱。要走这条路，就需要恰当地利用所说的不和谐，即当一个人从生命中汲取力量时……”

original: A bulky, heavy-duty experimental rifle with peculiar golden inlays along the length of its body.  Exploit otherworldly energy to tear a rift in reality, focusing it into a highly-destructive beam.  While its impact creates an EMP effect, the beam is utterly useless against robotic targets, and some anomalous monsters may also be immune to it.  Consumes UPS power and crystallized essence to fire, and may leave lingering wounds in The Veil with each shot.
translation: 一把使用不便但极具威力的的实验型激光炮，似乎不是地内产物，炮身拥有不知何种技术附上的奇特金斑浮纹。使用超自然的能量将现实空间撕裂使其聚合为一道毁灭能量束。虽然命中后会扰乱附近磁场产生临时电磁脉冲效应，但不知为何对机械目标却无效，还有一些来自未知面位的生命体也可能完全免疫其空间伤害。每次使用都会消耗大量UPS能量和一枚珍贵的璀璨源质，并在其帷幕上留下挥之不去的伤痕。

original: A bulky, heavy-duty experimental rifle with peculiar golden inlays along the length of its body.  Exploits otherworldly energy to tear a rift in reality, focusing it into a highly-destructive beam that risks carving wounds in The Veil with each shot.  While its impact creates an EMP effect, the beam itself is utterly useless against robotic targets, and some anomalous monsters may also be immune to it.  Consuming crystallized essence to fire makes its overall energy usage considerable, but its overwhelming power makes it more efficient than most energy weapons.
translation: 这是一款笨重、耐用的实验性步枪，其枪体镶嵌着特有的金色镶嵌物。它利用超自然能量撕裂现实，集中成一束具有高度破坏力的光束，每一次射击都有冒着在“帷幕”中留下裂痕的风险。虽然其冲击会产生电磁脉冲效果，但该光束对机器人目标完全无效，某些异常怪物也可能对其免疫。使用璀璨源质进行射击使其整体能源消耗相当大，但其压倒性的威力使其比大多数能量武器更为高效。

While its impact creates an EMP effect, the beam is utterly useless against robotic targets, and some anomalous monsters may also be immune to it.  Consuming UPS power and crystallized essence to fire makes its overall power draw considerable, but its overwhelming power makes it relatively more efficient than most energy weapons.
translation: 一把使用不便但极具威力的的实验型激光炮，似乎不是地内产物，炮身拥有不知何种技术附上的奇特金斑浮纹。使用超自然的能量将现实空间撕裂使其聚合为一道毁灭能量束。虽然命中后会扰乱附近磁场产生临时电磁脉冲效应，但不知为何对机械目标却无效，还有一些来自未知面位的生命体也可能完全免疫其空间伤害。每次使用都会消耗大量UPS能量和一枚珍贵的璀璨源质使其整体能量消耗相当巨大，但其压倒性的力量使其相对于大多数能量武器更有效。

original: A bulky, heavy-duty experimental rifle with peculiar golden inlays along the length of its body.  Exploits otherworldly energy to tear a rift in reality, focusing it into a highly-destructive beam.  While its impact creates an EMP effect, the beam is utterly useless against robotic targets, and some anomalous monsters may also be immune to it.  Consumes UPS power and crystallized essence to fire, and may leave lingering wounds in The Veil with each shot.
translation: 一把使用不便但极具威力的的实验型激光炮，似乎不是地内产物，炮身拥有不知何种技术附上的奇特金斑浮纹。使用超自然的能量将现实空间撕裂使其聚合为一道毁灭能量束。虽然命中后会扰乱附近磁场产生临时电磁脉冲效应，但不知为何对机械目标却无效，还有一些来自未知面位的生命体也可能完全免疫其空间伤害。每次使用都会消耗大量UPS能量和一枚珍贵的璀璨源质，并在其帷幕上留下挥之不去的伤痕。

original: A candle with translucent wax, free of any impurities with a soothing aura about it.  It can be used to place a magical barrier, or used to project a faint light.  The barrier this item creates is tough and provides a source of fire.  Examining the barrier will let you retrieve the candle.
translation: 一种半透明的蜡烛，不含任何杂质，带有舒缓的气氛。它可以用来放置魔法屏障，也可以用来投射微弱的光。这个物品制造的屏障很坚固并且可以提供火源。检查屏障可以让你取回蜡烛。

original: A carefully-gathered collection of papers outlining sacred rites and vital practices, mixing various religious practices attested to a order dedicated protecting humanity from dangerous magic.  It details the studies of an experienced mage hunter, containing nothing but essential information and reminders for the presumably well-learned author's benefit.
translation: 一个精心收集的文件，概述了神圣的仪式和重要的做法，混合了各种宗教活动证明的一种规则，保护人类免受危险的魔法。它详细介绍了一个经验丰富的法师猎人的研究，除了基本的信息和提示之外什么都没有，这可能对博学的作者有好处。

original: A carefully-gathered collection of papers outlining sacred rites and vital practices, mixing various religious practices attested to a order dedicated protecting humanity from dangerous magic.  It details the studies of an experienced mage hunter.  It can be used instead of The Cleansing Flame for recipes that require the book as a reference tool.
translation: 一本精心收集的文件集，概述了神圣的仪式和重要的习俗，混合了各种宗教习俗，证明了一项旨在保护人类免受危险魔法伤害的组织。它详细描述了一个有经验的法师猎人的研究。对于需要书籍作为参考工具的配方，可以用它来代替“净化之焰”。

original: A carefully-preserved assortment of papers, mostly filled with hymns to an otherworldly god and other unusual quotations.  On further reading it becomes evident that each song and passage holds ritual purpose, detailing the studies of an experienced scholar of this unearthly faith, containing nothing but essential information and reminders for the presumably well-learned author's benefit.
translation: 一份精心保存的有着各种各样内容的文件，大多装满了对一个异界神灵的赞美诗和其他不常见的引语。当你进一步阅读后很容易发现每首歌和每段经文都用于举行仪式，详细介绍了一位有经验的学者对这一非尘世信仰的研究，仅包含必要的信息和提示，可能对博学的读者有益。

original: A carefully-preserved assortment of papers, mostly filled with hymns to an otherworldly god and other unusual quotations.  On further reading it becomes evident that each song and passage holds ritual purpose, detailing the studies of an experienced scholar of this unearthly faith.  It can be used instead of Oaths to the Chalice for recipes that require the book as a reference tool.
translation: 这是一些保存完好的文件，其中大部分都是献给一位异世界神祇的赞美诗和其他一些不寻常的语录。经过进一步的阅读，我们可以清楚地看到，每一首歌和每一段文字都有仪式性的目的，详细描述了一位经验丰富的学者对这种神秘信仰的研究。对于需要书籍作为参考工具的配方，可以用它来代替《圣杯誓言》。

original: A compact device built using otherworldly mechanisms of arcane nature.  Originally designed to convert essence into power, it has been "upgraded" with mechanisms that draw power from the fabric of reality itself.  A true source of perpetual energy when installed on a vehicle, though now its power generation has been reduced quite a bit.  Thankfully still safe to use, at least.
translation: 一个小巧的装置，利用奥术属性的超凡机理所制造。它最初的作用是将源质转化为能源，但现在已经“升级”成为能够现实本身的结构中汲取能源的造物。安装在载具上便能当作一个真正的无限能源，只不过现在它的发电量已经减少了不少。但至少使用起来还是安全的，谢天谢地。

original: A compact device built using otherworldly mechanisms to burn crystalized essence for power, if integrated into a vehicle. original: A crude paper talisman marked with strange patterns, anointed with a pure sacrifice.  Using it will bind nearby summoned monsters as familiars, if they aren't hostile, allowing them to be used for more complex work.  In addition it will imbue them with protective energies, granting immunity to most environmental hazards save fire.  The protective effect will last a day, while the binding effect lasts 200 days.
translation: 一种粗糙的纸制护身符，上面有奇怪的图案，涂有纯祭品。使用它可以将附近召唤的怪物绑定为同伴，如果他们不是敌对的，则允许他们用于更复杂的工作。此外，它将为它们注入保护性能量，赋予它们对大多数环境危害的免疫力。保护作用持续一天，黏结作用持续200天。

original: A crude paper talisman marked with strange patterns, anointed with a pure sacrifice.  Using it will heal any nearby ally, pet, or friendly creature near you, along with enhancing them temporarily.  Friendly NPCs and monsters alike will gain increased speed as well as immunities to various debuffs such as blindness, bleeding, or stunning; while friendly monsters/pets specfically will gain increased melee damage, accuracy, and dodge.
translation: 一张粗糙的纸符，上面印有奇怪的图案，沾满了纯净的祭品。使用它会治愈你附近的任何盟友、宠物或友好生物，并在一段时间内增强它们。友方NPC和怪物都将获得增加的速度，以及对各种负面效果的免疫，如失明、流血或眩晕；而友方怪物/宠物具体来说还将获得增加的近战伤害、命中率和闪避。

original: A curved bronze blade, decorated with silver and honed to an unnaturally sharp edge.  Using it will channel blood essence into ensnaring a nearby enemy in venomous tendrils, poisoning them and freezing them in place momentarily.  Robots and other creatures immune to biological damage will not suffer damage from it.
translation: 这是一把弯曲的青铜刀刃,镶嵌着银饰,并且磨得异常锋利。使用它会引导猩血源质,将附近的敌人束缚在有毒的卷须中,使其中毒并暂时冻结在原地。机器人和其他对生物伤害免疫的生物不会受到它的伤害。

original: A cutting-edge piece of dimensional science, heavily modified to incorporate refinements from Beyond.  Using it will teleport you to a targeted location, a vast improvement over the uncertainty of previous devices, even destroying any obstacles that would make emergence unsafe.  However, using it might attract unwanted attention from things that do not belong in this world…
translation: 一件尖端的维度科学装置，经过大量修改，融合了来自“彼端”的精炼技术。使用它能将你传送到目标位置，相比之前设备的不确定性有了巨大的改进，甚至能摧毁任何可能使出现变得不安全的障碍。然而，使用它可能会吸引不属于这个世界的东西的不想要的注意…

original: A device modified from an exotic compact reactor, inverting its original function entirely.  Using a large surge of power by from any battery able to hold enough charge, it can generate crystallized essence.  The process is rather inefficient, and poses a high risk of damaging the fabric of reality.
translation: 一个从奇特的浪涌反应堆改造而来的紧凑装置，使其完全颠覆了它原有功能。任何型号的钚电池都能够使其提供能量，从帷幕中汲取精华从而形成璀璨源质。但这一过程相当缓慢，而且很有可能破坏空间之壁。

original: A device modified from an exotic compact reactor, inverting its original function entirely.  Using a large surge of power from any battery able to hold enough charge, it can generate crystallized essence.  The process is rather inefficient, and poses a high risk of damaging the fabric of reality.
translation: 一种由奇特的紧凑型反应堆改造而成的装置，完全颠覆了其原有功能。使用任何能够保持足够电荷的电池的大功率浪涌，它可以产生璀璨源质。这个过程效率很低，而且有很大的风险破坏现实结构。

original: A dog-eared, ragged collection of papers, filled with outlines of morbid rituals and macabre references on matters of blood.  It details the studies of an experienced blood mage, containing nothing but essential information and reminders for the presumably well-learned author's benefit.

original: A dog-eared, ragged collection of papers, filled with outlines of morbid rituals and macabre references on matters of blood.  It details the studies of an experienced blood mage.  It can be used instead of Sanguine Codex for recipes that require the book as a reference tool.
translation: 一本皱巴巴的、破烂的文件集，里面充满了病态仪式的概述和关于鲜血研究的令人毛骨悚然的参考。它详细介绍了一个经验丰富的血法师的研究。对于需要书籍作为参考工具的配方，可以用它来代替《血红法典》。

Moreover, the few reports of people who have lingered in the area have reported a wave of bad dreams, strange visions.  Seems to describe monsters that aren't among the usual interlopers.

original: A few of their early entries, the first few days into the journey, references nearby landmarks.  The last one before things go off the rails mentions a recently-built otherworldly structure in their path, and I can confirm which location that is.  Given the description suggests something anomalous happened there more recently, it's possible that the source of this took up residence there.  Go talk to Johnathan, tell him we have what we need.
translation: 在旅途的前几天，他们的一些行动依赖附近的地标。在事情偏离轨道之前的最后一个成员提到了在他们的行进路线上最近产生的一个超自然的结构，我可以确定这是在哪一个位置。鉴于描述显示最近那里发生了一些不正常的事情，这很可能是来源于那里。去和约翰纳森谈谈，告诉他我们已经拥有了我们需要的东西。

Grandmaster Leone seems to be the most senior of the group, and he provided me with a lot of information I'll need to examine closely.  Might lead us to other survivors to get in touch with.  Might be a good idea to speak with him as well.

original: A few scattered signs of your order, despite our conflict almost wiping us both out.  The Keepers of the Oath seem to be just about extinct too, largely thanks to your fellows.  That just leaves various cults and handfuls of independent practitioners, as far as I'm aware.  I can only pray that they don't make things worse, with no one left to guide them.
translation: 尽管我们的冲突几乎将我们双方都消灭殆尽，但仍有零星的迹象显示出你们的组织存在。守誓者似乎也几乎灭绝了，这在很大程度上要归咎于你们。据我所知，这只留下了各种教派和少数独行者。我只能祈祷他们不会让情况变得更糟，现在没有人领导他们了。
context:

Powerful, but robots and some anomalous monsters are immune to its effects.  Requires crystallized essence and electricity to fire, and may tear holes in The Veil with each shot.
translation: 一把使用不便但极具威力的的实验型激光炮，似乎不是地内产物，炮身拥有不知何种技术附上的奇特金斑浮纹。使用超自然的能量将现实空间撕裂使其聚合为一道毁灭能量束。虽然命中后会扰乱附近磁场产生临时电磁脉冲效应，但不知为何对机械目标却无效，还有一些来自未知面位的生命体也可能完全免疫其空间伤害。每次使用都会消耗大量UPS能量和一枚珍贵的璀璨源质，并在其帷幕上留下挥之不去的伤痕。

original: A heavy-duty, ruggedized briefcase with an outdated laptop built into it, powered by an integral plutonium cell.  A concealed camera is also built into the case, and there's an old model of satellite phone inside too.  The phone seems to be out of minutes and the camera lens is broken, but the laptop contains all sorts of cryptic notes, photos of various strange landmarks, and maps of locations across the tri-county area.  Someone might be able to make use of the intel that could be gleaned from this device.
translation: 一种耐用的公文包，里面装有一台过时的笔记本电脑，由一个完整的钚电池供电。盒子里还内置了一个隐藏的摄像头，里面还有一个老式的卫星电话。手机似乎没几分钟了，相机镜头也坏了，但笔记本电脑里有各种神秘的笔记、各种奇怪地标的照片，以及横跨三县地区的位置地图。也许有人可以利用从这个设备上收集到的情报。

translation: 一个庞大却异常轻盈的零件堆，由异常技术驱动，配备了外来激光武器和先进的防御工具。安装了一个由魔力源质驱动的完全定制的能量单元，使用它来部署和设置机甲进入驾驶状态，从其能量单元中随机消耗一定数量的充能以恢复其生机。

original: A large volume, the bulk of anomalous items on these shipping records, eventually found their way to a single site.  That's what we're after, and I've also figured out exactly what we need.  One of the earlier shipments on record mentions something called a dimensional focus lens.  Given what we know of the project and what they were trying to accomplish, that's the component we need to acquire to use their findings to further our own work.  Will you help us?
translation: 这些运输记录中有大量奇怪的物品，最终都运到了同一个地方。这正是我们感兴趣的地方，而且我已经弄清楚我们需要什么了。在记录中，早期的一批货物提到了一个叫做“维度聚焦镜”的东西。考虑到我们对项目的了解以及他们想要实现的目标，这个组件是我们需要获取的，我们希望利用他们的研究成果来推动我们自己的工作。你能帮助我们吗？

original: A powerful electric motor relying on spatial distortion.  Outputs more energy than it consumes, but unusable as a source of free energy.  Multiple can be installed with no skill penalty, but alternators cannot be installed on it.

original: A proper sanguinist sect isn't like Elena's group.  They'll likely be led by a magus, and there's no way you'll talk any sense into them.  If they have a shrike, you might be able to talk them into defecting.  We had a handful of trust passwords used when returning from a scouting run.  Tell me what the hunters have said about your target and maybe I can give you one that'll keep whoever's on watch off your back long enough to silence them.  Better than letting them alert the rest.
translation: 一个真正的猩红教派不像艾琳娜的组织。他们很可能会被法师领导，你不可能说服他们。如果他们有屠猎者，你也许可以说服他们叛变。我们在侦查回来的时候用了一些能够证明自己的口令。 告诉我猎手们对你的目标说了些什么，也许我能给你一个能让监视你的人保持沉默的口令。 总比让他们惊动其他人要好。

original:
A series of handwritten notes by a student of some esoteric order.  At first the subject seems to be simple religious rituals, but it soon delves into more ...anomalous practices.
"In time, my eyes will be opened.  They called it The Gift, but all who draw breath can partake of it.  There is no innate talent, no quirk of bloodline, only discipline and patience..."
translation:
一个学生以某种神秘的顺序手写的一系列笔记。起初，这个主题似乎是简单的宗教仪式，但很快就深入到了更多的……反常的行为。
”到时候，我的眼睛会睁开的。他们称之为恩赐，但所有生者都可以分享。无所谓天赋，不需要血统，只需要自律和耐心……”

original:
A series of handwritten notes by a student of some esoteric order.  At first the subject seems to be simple religious rituals, but it soon delves into more …anomalous practices.
"In time, my eyes will be opened.  They called it The Gift, but all who draw breath can partake of it.  There is no innate talent, no quirk of bloodline, only discipline and patience…"
translation:
一系列手记，由某个神秘组织的学徒所写。起初，主题似乎只是简单的宗教仪式，但很快就变为…一些非比寻常的实验。
“时机成熟，我的心灵将会打开。他们称之为‘天赋’，但所有呼吸着空气的人都可以分享其中。没有天生的才能，没有血统的奇异，只有自律和耐心…”

original:
A series of translated, annotated excerpts from several ancient books on the concept of alchemy.  This book presents an unconventional interpretation of the works discussed, haphazardly segueing into the author's own failed attempt to create the "lapis philosophorum" and "alkahest".  Some of the unconventional chemistry discussed might still be useful.
"Through all the cycles of putrefaction and purification, we have fallen short of refinement into the Rubedo stage.  We are missing a catalyst, something even purer than gold, energy embodied in matter..."
translation:
一系列关于炼金术概念的古籍，经过了翻译和注释摘录。书中所讲述的内容进行了不同寻常的解释，不经意间插入一些了作者自己创造“点金石”和“万能溶剂”的失败经历。其中涉及的某些不同寻常的化学方法可能仍然会派上用场。
“在所有的腐化和纯化周期中，我们都无法进行赤化阶段的精制。我们缺少一种蕴含能量比金更纯净的催化剂…”

original:
A series of translated, annotated excerpts from several ancient books on the concept of alchemy.  This book presents an unconventional interpretation of the works discussed, haphazardly segueing into the author's own failed attempt to create the "lapis philosophorum" and "alkahest".  Some of the unconventional chemistry discussed might still be useful.
"Through all the cycles of putrefaction and purification, we have fallen short of refinement into the Rubedo stage.  We are missing a catalyst, something even purer than gold, energy embodied in matter…"
translation:
一系列古籍中关于炼金术概念的翻译和注释摘录。这本书提出了一种非传统的解释，杂乱地过渡到作者自己对创造“哲学之石”和“全灵”失败的尝试。其中讨论的一些非传统化学仍可能有用。
“通过所有的腐败和净化周期，我们未能进入红化阶段的提炼。我们缺少一个催化剂，比金更纯净的东西，物质中体现的能量…”

original: A set of mail armor with a mantle made from a gilded aegis draped over it, splints of copper worked into the arms and sides. In addition to protecting against lightning, an aura of protective magic is radiating from it, granting immunity to fire and blade, reducing ballistic damage to one-tenth what you would normally take, and giving resistance to other environmental hazards.

original:
A silver and gold relic encircling and framing a pitch-black gem.  All across the metal are holy symbols and engraved text mixing archaic Latin, Old Norse runes, and symbols that don't seem to match any writing humans have devised.  Combining dimensional fatigue research with the knowledge of multiple arcane orders, it was made to serve the same purpose as the Keepers' relics and Project Kairos.

Linger near a portal to collapse it into a form you can harvest crystallized essence from, then fuel it with crystallized essence.  Channeling this energy will create a powerful healing effect affecting you and nearby allies, remove alien influence on your surroundings, as well as restore dead plant life nearby.  Note that essence loaded into it cannot be unloaded.
translation:
一枚银色和金色的圣物，环绕着一个漆黑的宝石。金属上布满了圣洁的符号和雕刻文字，混合了古老的拉丁文、古诺尔斯符文和人类未曾设计的符号。结合了维度疲劳研究和多个奥秘秩序的知识，它被制造出来以服务于守护者的遗物和凯洛斯计划的相同目的。

在附近逗留，使一个传送门坍缩成你可以从中收集结晶精华的形式，然后用结晶精华为其提供能量。引导这种能量将产生强大的治愈效果，影响你和附近的盟友，清除你周围的异界影响，并恢复附近的植物生命。请注意，加载到其中的精华无法卸载。

original:
A small container made out of a polished, glassy material resembling stone.  A shimmer of precious metal occasionally appears within the surface, as though its internal structure flowed like liquid.  Deploying it will create a temporary workspace of shifting earth, providing a hard surface usable as an anvil as well as shifting stones that can assist in metalworking and alchemy.  It can be examined afterward to reclaim it.

When deployed it provides the following:
* Level 3 anvil quality.
* Level 2 boiling quality.
* Level 2 chemical making quality.
* Level 1 containing quality.
* Level 1 food cooking quality.
* Level 2 clean surface quality.
* Additionally serves as a crucible.
translation:
一个由抛光的玻璃材质制成的小容器。贵金属的微光偶尔会出现在表面，似乎它的内部结构像液体一样流动。部署它将创造一个临时的工作空间，提供一个可用作铁砧的坚硬表面，以及可以帮助金属加工和化工制造的工具。之后可以通过检视来回收。

部署时，它提供了以下特性:
 *3级铁砧。
 *2级煮沸。
 *2级化工制造。
 *1级敞口容器。
 *1级食物烹调。
 *2级清洁表面。
 *还可用作坩埚。

original: A small fabric pouch decorated with ornate textile imagery depicting an otherworldly abstract pattern, further adorned with copper rings and clasps.  It is said to represent the search for greater knowledge of the unknown, focused by a drive to find utility and purpose in new discoveries.  It uses the power of a vortex to store a great volume of items that can be easily accessed, but the portal's instability can draw attention from Beyond, or potentially cause you to teleport when struck.  You can also use it to set aside certain items for even faster access, if it serves as a magical focus.
translation: 一种装饰有华丽的纺织图案的小布袋，描绘了一幅超凡脱俗的抽象图案，并用铜环和扣子进一步装饰。据说，它代表着对未知事物更多知识的探索，专注于寻找新发现的效用和目的。它利用漩涡的力量来储存大量的物品，并使得它们便于收纳，但是物品传送入口的不稳定性会引起异界的注意，在被击中时可能导致你被随机传送。如果物品带有亲和魔力的特征，你可以更快地收纳它们。

original: A small fabric pouch decorated with ornate textile imagery depicting an otherworldly abstract pattern, further adorned with copper rings and clasps. You can also use it to set aside certain items for even faster access, if it serves as a magical focus.
translation: 一个小巧的织物袋，装饰着华丽的纺织图案，描绘着一个超凡脱俗的抽象图案，上面还装饰着铜环和扣子。据说它象征着对未知事物更深入了解的追求，由发现新事物的动力来集中注意力，以找到更多的效用和目的。它利用虚空的力量来储存大量物品，这些物品可以很容易地被取出，但是空间的不稳定性意味着受到攻击可能会引起彼端的反应，或者导致你传送。如果它作为一个魔法节点，你也可以用它来放置一些特定的物品，以便更快地使用它。

original:
A strange book with a trident motif on the cover, describing the morbid rituals of some otherworldly cult, preaching of He From Beyond The Veil.  The level of detail these rituals go into is disturbing, yet informative.
"Through my visions, I saw rolling fog sweep across the valleys of a thousand worlds.  I witnessed the decay of countless cities, built by endless unnamed things.  And there, shadows coalesced into form, a presence to guide me..."
translation:
一本封面上绘着三叉图案的怪异之书，书中描述了一些超自然的邪教变态仪式，宣扬一位帷幕之外的神祇，这些繁琐仪式令人感到不安。
“透过我的视界，我看到浓密的雾笼罩着千山万水。我见证了无数由无名之物建造成的城市的衰落。在那儿，阴影融合升华为一种新的形式，形成一种指引我的存在…”

translation: 一把由黑暗金属制成的双手剑。上面刻着陌生的符号，还有一个你竟能够读懂的短语：“涅赫里特阿希尔”。激活它将赋予持剑者一股强大的、腐化的、令人上瘾的生命汲取魔法效果，但在其效果消失之前，你无法放下它。

original: A two-handed sword richly engraved with exotic runes, all in scripts not of this world.  Once corrupted and now restored, it can only serve a fragment of its original purpose.  Fueling it with crystallized essence will grant great gifts, but set you down a path you can't return from.
translation: 一把双手剑,上面刻有丰富的异域符文,都是非此世的文字。曾经被腐化,现在已被修复,但只能发挥其原本一小部分的威力。用璀璨源质来激活它,会带来强大的效果,但也会让你走上无法回头的道路。

original: A two-handed sword richly engraved with exotic runes, all in scripts not of this world.  Once corrupted and now restored, it can only serve a fragment of its original purpose.  Linger near a portal to collapse it into a form you can harvest crystallized essence from.  Use "consume" to offer power to the Beyond.  It will grant great gifts, but set you down a path you can't return from.  Using "cast spell" instead will channel its fuel into a burst of energy, restoring 1500 mana if used on yourself …or, unravel a single nearby enemy for massive damage.
translation: 一把双手剑，上面雕刻着异域文字，都是非人间的符文。曾经被腐化，现在已经恢复，但只能发挥其原本功能的一小部分。靠近传送门时，它会崩溃成一种你可以收集结晶精华的形态。使用“consume”将能量奉献给彼岸。它会给予伟大的礼物，但会让你走上一条无法回头的道路。而使用“cast spell”则会将其能量引导成一股能量爆发，如果对自己使用，可恢复1500法力……或者，解体一个附近的敌人，造成巨大伤害。

original: A war.  That's the only thing that comes to mind.  There were signs of more than just the usual collateral damage. Not like we can test it, though.

original: A warped sheet of exotic metal, covered in esoteric engravings.  The patterns depicted on it resemble astrological imagery and alchemical formulas, with fragments of legible writing encircling the outer edge of the design.  On closer inspection, parts of the engraving appear to resemble technical drawings and schematics for the very machine it was torn from, either for some ritual purpose that helped give it life, or for some unknown research purpose.  Someone skilled in otherworldly knowledge might be able to glean something useful from this.
translation: 一张扭曲的异国情调的金属片，覆盖着深奥的版画。上面描绘的图案类似于占星图像和炼金术公式，清晰可辨的文字碎片环绕在设计的外部边缘。仔细观察，雕刻的一些部分看起来像是从机器上撕下来的技术图纸和示意图，要么是为了某种仪式目的，帮助赋予它生命，要么是为了某种未知的研究目的。精通超凡脱俗知识的人也许能从中收集到一些有用的东西。

original: A wreath of brightly-colored flowers from another world, worn around the neck.  Elemental magic has been woven into its structure, converting it into a primitive magic item.  Using it will grant a burst of renewed stamina, recovering pain and speeding up the body's natural healing.  It will take a long time to recharge after each use, and activating it also fatigues the user.  It can hold up to 6 uses, each use takes 25 charges.
translation: 戴在脖子上的由另一个世界的鲜艳的花组成的花环。元素魔法被编织到它的结构中，把它变成一个原始的魔法物品。使用它将给予一个新的耐力爆发，恢复疼痛和加快身体的自然愈合。每次激活后，用户都需要很长时间来充电。它最多可以使用6次。每次使用需要25充能。

original: Alright.  Sofia's skeptical that I can make a large-scale breakthrough with this.  I can use what I've learned, and a little help from her, to liven up the compound here and grow a few things, but it seems it'll take a lot of energy plus burn out whatever force is still present in these petals.  They have a way to weave its effects into someone's very being so they don't need to hunt monsters, but that just makes it drain energy out of whoever uses it instead.  Still, thank you for the help, should have the finishing touches ready right quick.
translation: 好吧。索菲亚的人怀疑我能否在这方面取得大规模突破。我可以利用我所学到的东西，并从她那里得到一点帮助，使这里的化合物变得活跃起来，并长出一些东西，但这似乎需要大量的能量，并消耗掉这些花瓣中仍然存在的任何力量。他们有一种方法可以把它的效果附加到某个人的身体里，这样他们就不需要去猎杀怪物，并且这只会让使用它的人消耗能量。不过，谢谢你的帮助，接下来应该很快就能完成收尾工作。

Fires an anomalous bolt of energy that can jump from target to target, generating an electrothermal effect that leaves burning plasma in its erratic wake.  Inefficient and indiscriminate, but highly destructive if used in a target-rich environment.
translation: 一种先进的能量武器，尽管有些笨重，利用了奇异现象。它发射一种异常的能量，能够在目标之间跳跃，产生电热效应，在它不规则的轨迹中留下燃烧的等离子体。这种武器效率低下且不分目标，但如果在目标较多的环境中使用，破坏力极大。

original: An alchemical mixture permeating a combustible base of charcoal or resin, resulting in a peculiar sort of incense.  Lighting it will rapidly burn away the strange concoction, invigorating its user with a focused effect similar to the potions originally used to make it.  It trades much of its effect on strength and speed for instead directly relieving fatigue through unusual means, though long-term use without rest is not recommended.
translation: 一种渗透了易燃的木炭或树脂基底的炼金混合物，形成了一种奇特的香。这种奇特的香点燃它会迅速燃烧掉，通过类似最初用于制作它的药水的集中效果，使其使用者精神振奋。它牺牲了大部分对力量和速度的影响，转而通过不寻常的方式直接缓解疲劳，尽管不建议长期使用而不休息。

original:
An alchemical mixture permeating a combustible base of charcoal or resin, resulting in a peculiar sort of incense.  Using it will invigorate the user with a focused effect similar to the potions originally used to make it.  Rather than affecting strength and speed, it will directly restore a large burst of stamina and fatigue.

Each use will restore 30 fatigue, and 3000 stamina.
translation:
一种渗透了可燃物质如木炭或树脂的炼金混合物，从而产生了一种特殊的香。使用它将通过类似于最初用于制造它的药水的集中效果，激发使用者的活力。它不会影响力量和速度，而是会直接恢复大量的耐力和疲劳。

每次使用将恢复30点疲劳和3000点耐力。

original: An arcane what?  I need to look this up.  Religious shit, scattered police chatter over the years, small-scale vigilante stuff.  Old records that suggest something federal authorities were keeping an eye on but didn't see as much of a threat.  I don't even remotely know what to make of this.  I guess the world was going crazy for longer than I thought it was.
translation: 神秘的什么？我要查一下。宗教垃圾，多年来警察的闲聊，小规模的义务警员。旧的记录表明联邦当局正在关注一些事情，但没有看到太多的威胁。我一点也不知道该怎么办。我想世界疯狂的时间比我想象的要长。

original: An ornate round mirror in an archaic style, unnaturally light for its size.  Natural scenery appears to be engraved into it, and light reflected from it projects a completely different, otherworldly pattern.  It is capable of moving on its own when equipped, blocking melee attacks like a small shield.  When fueled by essence, it projects a barrier that provides less physical defense, but protects against electricity and radiation, along with partial resistance to psychic influence and extreme temperatures.
translation: 一面有着古老的风格的华丽圆形镜子，尺寸不大但重量异常的轻。它的表面仿佛刻有自然景色，从它反射的光线中投射出完全不同的异世界图案。当被装备时，它能够自行移动，像小盾牌一样阻挡近身攻击。当使用精华激活时，它会投射出一道屏障，提供较少的物理防御，但可防止电击和辐射，同时部分抵抗心灵影响和极端温度。

original: An ornate round mirror in an archaic style, unnaturally light for its size. An ornate silver dagger, seemingly made for ritual purposes.  It seems sharper than silver has any right to be.  It can be used to perform a ritual converting your life force into blood essence.  Doing so will take 5 minutes, inflicting blood loss and damage at the end, as well as potential consequences if overused...
translation: 一把华丽的银匕首，似乎是为了仪式而制作的。它看起来比银应该更锋利。它可以用来执行一个仪式，将你的生命力转化为猩血源质。这个过程需要5分钟时间，在最后会造成失血和伤害，如果过度使用，还可能导致一些副作用……

original: An ornate silver weapon combining two flintlock barrels with a thin blade.  It's folded into its more compact pistol form, allowing it to be loaded and fired.  Its shots are imbued with a deathly chill.  The damage it adds to shots can ignore mundane armor, but robots and certain otherworldly monsters will only suffer the bullet's regular damage.  Activate it to revert back to blade form, making it better suited for melee but preventing you from being able to load or fire it.
translation: 一件装饰华丽的银质武器，将两支燧发枪管与一柄细薄刀刃合为一体。它折叠为更为紧凑的手枪形态，便于装填与射击。其所射出的子弹蕴含致命寒气。其附加于子弹的伤害可无视普通护甲，但机器人及某些异界怪物只会受到子弹本身的常规伤害。激活后可回复至刀剑形态，使其更适合近战，但此时将无法进行装填或射击。

original: And to think I knew what to expect out of you, Marshal.  This is insane.  These people made a mockery of national security.  But I guess they didn't get that far, if you still need our help.  Alright, to hell with it.  If you let me keep that list of info I'll give you the shipment information in return.  Then I'm going to need get a stiff drink next time I'm off duty.
translation: 想想我知道你会怎么样，警长。这太疯狂了。这些人嘲弄了国家安全。但我想他们没走那么远，如果你还需要我们的帮助。好吧，让它见鬼去吧。如果你让我保留那份信息清单，我会给你发货信息作为回报。那我下次下班的时候需要喝一杯烈酒。

original: As much work as we've put into securing this place, in time we will need much more than mere shelter.  My hope is to not only preserve the knowledge we've accumulated over the years, but use it to help others.  But for that, we need to work closely with outsiders.  We need more than just intermittent trading with the center's merchant, if we are to attract others to our cause.  Would you be able to help us with this?
translation: 虽然我们已经在确保这个地方的安全上下了不少功夫，但终究我们需要的不仅仅是庇护所。我的愿望不仅是保存我们多年来积累的知识，更是要用这些知识去帮助他人。为此，我们需要与外界紧密合作。如果我们想要吸引更多人加入我们的事业，就必须不只是与中心商贩进行间歇性的交易。你能在这方面帮我们一把吗？

I know it sounds crazy, but there might be something in what I recall that we could investigate.
translation: 尽管现实变得如此离奇，我还是试图找出这一切背后的答案。如果找不到答案，至少希望能有个了断。在一切彻底失控前不久，我开始做起了关于异界景象的奇怪梦境，而现在一切都陷入了混乱，我不禁怀疑这些梦境是否有什么深意。我知道这听起来很疯狂，但我回忆中的某些片段也许值得我们进一步调查。

original: Be cautious in what methods you use to obtain the offering. As for other rifts to seal, remember every place that you have seen touched by the influence of the arcane, and of mundane hazards as well.  I have little experience in the laboratories that inflicted so much destruction, but they may hold remnants that can be mended.
translation: 在获取供品的过程中务必谨慎选择方法。只有在必要的情况下才能通过召唤仪式对帷幕造成影响，切勿因血魔法的诱惑而对自己造成不必要的伤害。至于要封印的其他裂隙，请记住所有受到奥术力量影响的地方，以及受到常规危险影响的场所。对于那些曾经造成巨大破坏的实验室，我经验有限，但它们可能残存着可以修复的关键线索。

original: Before all this boiled over, who would believe us?  With the dead rising, and strange powers decaying the very fabric of reality, we can afford to be more open about our nature.  We seek to protect people from dangerous magic and otherworldly monsters.  The first signs of these threats were isolated, forbidden knowledge slipping through the cracks, minor symptoms of whatever caused this.  Now it is more than any one group can handle, I fear.
translation: 在这一切爆发之前，谁会相信我们呢？随着死亡的增加，奇异的力量正在腐朽现实的根基，我们现在有必要更加公开我们的本质。我们的目标是保护人们免受危险魔法和异界怪物的侵害。这些威胁的最初迹象是孤立的，禁忌知识透过裂缝泄露出来，只是如今这一切灾难的轻微症状。而现在，恐怕单靠任何一个组织都无法应对这些危机了。

original: Before all this started, an old parish church.  Many of our sanctums took the form of any church, hof, or other such place sympathetic to our cause.  I'd known the priest here for years, and he sheltered us many times despite the heathen nature of many of us, including myself.  This was a natural choice on realizing how dire the situation was, though we found the place abandoned at some point during the chaos.
translation: 在这一切开始之前，这里是一座古老的教区教堂。我们的诸多圣地往往伪装成教堂、祠堂或其他对我们事业抱有同情之心的场所。我与这里的牧师相识多年，尽管包括我在内的许多人秉持异教信仰，他仍多次为我们提供庇护。当意识到局势危急时，这里自然而然成为了我们的首选之地，然而在混乱之中，我们在某个时刻发现这里已被废弃。

original: By Thor and The God In Three Persons both, may you be victorious.  The evil lurking there was described as wielding a clawed weapon that warped The Veil itself with hellfire, until it was struck from its fiery grasp by a lucky strike.  They were able to seal it behind a barrier with one of our swords as the keystone, and you will need to undo the seal to confront it.  If you can retrieve that infernal weapon in your hunt, we will be able to destroy it safely.  I would commit a full hunting party if only we could spare anyone.  Dii vult!
translation: 愿雷神托尔与圣三一致之力，赐予汝胜利之荣耀。潜伏在那里的邪恶，挥舞着利爪，用地狱之火扭曲了帷幕，直到它被宿命的一击从它炽热的手中击中。他们用剑——那封印之匙——作为阵眼，将其囚禁在屏障之后，你要解开这个封印，才能与它对抗。若你能在猎途中寻回那凶器，我们就能安全地摧毁它。若非人手短缺，我等定然倾力为之。迪伊·瓦特！

original: By Thor and The God In Three Persons both, may you be victorious.  The evil lurking there was described as wielding a clawed weapon that warped The Veil itself with hellfire, until it was struck from its fiery grasp by a lucky strike.  They were able to seal it behind a barrier with one of our swords as the keystone, and you will need to undo the seal to confront it.  This artifact is dangerous enough I will require you to entrust it to our care, this time.  We should be able to destroy it safely.  I would commit a full hunting party if only we could spare anyone.  Dii vult!
translation: 以索尔与三位一体之神的名义，愿你凯旋而归。潜伏其中的邪恶力量据说手持一把燃烧地狱烈焰的利爪武器，能扭曲帷幕本身，直至被幸运一击从其炽热掌握中击落。他们用我们的其中一把剑作为基石，成功将其封印于屏障之后。你必须解除封印才能与其正面交锋。这件神器危险至极，此次我要求你将它交给我们妥善处理。我们应能安全地销毁它。若非人力有限，我定会派出一支全副武装的猎杀队伍。愿命运眷顾！
context:

original: Consecrate is designed to purify the terrain, either petrifying or disintegrating most anomalous or otherworldly alterations to the landscape.  Less well-known is what it does to most otherworldly monsters caught in its effect.  It's not intended as an offensive spell first and foremost, but it'll damage most such monsters and leave them reeling.  I'll need 4 Golden Scales to cover everything that a proper ritual will require.
translation: “圣化”旨在净化地形，无论是石化还是消解大多数对地貌造成的异常或异界改变。鲜为人知的是，它会对受其影响的大多数异界怪物产生何种作用。首先，它并非作为一种攻击性法术设计，但确实会对大部分这类怪物造成伤害并使其陷入混乱。进行一场完备仪式的话，我需要四枚黄金鳞片来覆盖所有需求。

original: During our journey we've seen scattered evidence of some hazards still afflicting certain areas, former hotspots of anomalous activity now made even more dangerous, ever since holes in reality began opening up.  With the rest of us focused on rebuilding and securing the area, I would like to ask your assistance with investigating one such location, and retrieving an artifact of historical importance believed to be lost there.
translation: 在我们的旅程中，我们已目睹了一些证据，表明某些区域仍受到一些危害的影响，这些地方曾是异常活动的热点，自现实出现裂缝以来变得愈发危险。随着我们其余人专注于重建与稳固该区域，我想请求您协助调查其中一个这样的地点，并在那里找回一件被认为遗失的重要历史文物。

original: During the riots, arrangements were made to transport sensitive materials away from research facilities deemed at-risk.  This included a few important materials from XEDRA sites in the area, as well as those other pet projects.  We know the location of a small-scale staging area for these arrangements.  The portal storms quickly warranted an adjustment in priorities, but if the site is intact you might find something useful to us.
translation: 暴乱期间，针对被认为存在风险的研究设施，人们采取措施转移了其中的敏感材料。这一行动涵盖了该地区XEDRA站点内的一些关键物品，以及其它几个特别关注的项目。我们已经掌握了一个用于此类转移行动的小型临时存放点的位置。尽管突如其来的时空门风暴立刻导致了优先事项的调整，但如果该地点未受破坏，你或许能在那里找到对我们有益的东西。

original: GHOST TOWN BLOODBATH - VIGILANTES SUSPECTED: State Police have uncovered the remains of a clash between a suspected cult and a local gang, in a former Appalachian mining town.  "We first suspected that it was just a drug ring in the wrong place at the wrong time." says the Deputy Superintendent.  "But there are definitely signs that someone else got involved as well, and destroyed a lot of evidence afterward."
translation: 幽灵镇上的血腥监狱-涉嫌犯罪者：州警察在一个前阿巴拉契亚采矿小镇发现了一个可疑的邪教组织与当地帮派之间的冲突遗骸。“我们首先怀疑这只是在错误地点的一个毒品圈。副校长说，"时间错了。”但是，肯定有迹象表明有人也卷入其中，并随后销毁了许多证据。

original: God and gods willing, may you return safe and victorious.  This will be a dangerous task, and while we may be stretched thin, I will allow you to request assistance at your discretion.  We can spare another hunter for a task this dangerous.
translation: 上天和众神意愿,祝你平安凯旋。这将是一项危险的任务,尽管我们人手紧张,但考虑到任务的危险性,我会允许你根据自己的判断请求援助。我们可以为如此危险的任务再分配一名猎人。

original: God and gods willing, return safe and sound.  I will once more authorize you to request the aid of one of our hunters if you require it.  Furthermore, if you did not already seek their aid last time, you may still do so.  We can afford that much at least, for a mission this important.
translation: 上天和众神意愿,祝你平安凯旋。我再次授权你,如果需要,可以请求我们的一名猎人提供帮助。此外,如果你上次没有寻求他们的帮助,现在仍然可以这样做。对于如此重要的任务,我们只能提供这么多支援。

original: Gods above and below, I'm glad you're back in one piece.  I'm guessing she didn't make it.  From the look of this, the laptop almost didn't either.  But it looks like I can get intel out of it, so her death won't be in vain.  Come see me when you've rested up a bit, whenever you feel you're ready.
translation: 众神保佑，我很高兴你安然无恙地回来了。我猜她没能活下来。从这个情况看，笔记本电脑也差点遭殃。但看起来我可以从中获取情报，所以她的牺牲不会白费。稍微休息一下，当你觉得准备好了，就来找。
context:

original: Gods above and below, to think this thing caused one of our holiest places to fall to ruin.  I doubt it will be safe to reclaim that place anytime soon.  Anything else you found down there is yours to use as you see fit.  I hope that those who fell holding that thing back are at peace.  Speak with me when you see fit.
translation: 天上的诸神与地下的众神啊，没想到这邪物竟导致了我们最神圣的场所沦为废墟。恐怕短时间内那里都无法安全地收复。你在下面发现的任何其他东西，都由你自行处置。愿那些为抵挡它而牺牲的人们安息。你觉得合适的时候再来找我谈谈吧。
context:

original: Gods above and below, to think this thing caused one of our holiest places to fall to ruin.  I doubt it will be safe to reclaim that place anytime soon.  Anything you found down their is yours to use as you see fit.  I hope that those who fell holding that thing back are are peace.  Speak with me when you see fit, I have another thing to ask of you.
translation: 天上地下的诸神啊,想到这个东西导致我们最神圣的地方之一沦为废墟,我怀疑在短时间内重新夺回那个地方是否安全。你在那找到的任何东西都可以随意使用。我希望那些在阻挡那个东西时牺牲的人能安息。你觉得合适的时候就来跟我谈谈,我还有另一件事要拜托你。

original: Gods above and below, to think this thing caused one of our holiest places to fall to ruin.  I doubt it will be safe to reclaim that place anytime soon.  Anything you found down their is yours to use as you see fit.  I hope that those who fell holding that thing back are are peace.  Speak with me when you see fit.
translation: 众神啊，想到这个东西导致我们其中一个最神圣的地方沦为废墟，真是令人难以置信。我怀疑在短时间内重新夺回那个地方会非常危险。你在那里找到的任何东西都属于你，并且可以随意使用。我希望那些牺牲了以阻止那个东西的人们都能得到安宁。你觉得合适的时候再和我交谈吧。

original: Golden Scales are those little coins the locals here use.  Seems it's picking up as a currency.  Personally I'd prefer silver dollars if we're talking hard cash, but you use what you can get if you don't like bartering your shirt away for a hot meal.  These people seem to have some other use for em, too.
translation: 黄金鳞片是当地人使用的那些小硬币。看来它正在成为一种流通货币。就我个人而言,如果我们讨论的是硬通货,我更喜欢银元,但如果你不想用你的衬衫来换一顿热乎乎饭,你就得用你能得到的东西来交换。这些人似乎拿黄金鳞片还有其他用途。

original: Good, that narrows it down.  They're a division of the Order responsible for this nonsense about what they called the Dragonnblood Sacrament.  Dragged half the other magi into that tangle and cost us our best-defended safehouse.  Not many sects dabbling in mutation survived this long.  Try the phrase, "The moonlit sky anoints the worthy, who seek The Path home."  It's an old pass phrase, but to my knowledge it was still in use up until they lost the hideout. That might give them pause long enough to catch them off guard.
translation: 很好，范围缩小了 。他们是圣职会的一个分支，负责制造所谓的龙血圣礼的谣言。把其他一半的魔法师都卷入了这场纠葛，让我们失去了防守最严密的安全屋。 没有几个涉足变异的教派能存活这么久。 试试那句"月光照耀着寻找回家之路的人们。" 这是句很老的密语，但据我所知，直到他们失去藏身之处之前，这句话仍在使用。 这可能会让他们停顿足够长的时间，并使他们措手不及。

original: Good.  I've taken the time to speak with the others, pass the word around, and study our maps.  I think between what you've brought in and what the other scouts were able to find out, we have a fix on the source of this anomaly.  I want to take some time to prepare yourself, then see me when you're ready.  This may prove to be a difficult fight.
translation: 很好。我已经花时间与其他成员进行了交谈，将信息传开，并研究了我们的地图。我认为结合你带来的发现和其他侦察兵所探查到的情况，我们已经锁定了这次异常现象的源头。我希望你先花些时间做好准备，待准备好之后再来找我。这可能是一场艰难的战斗。
context:
ID: TALK_CF_GM_PRELUDE_4_READY

original: Good.  Seeing you walk in here alive, I could almost sense that the deed was done.  I do not know the cause of this, nor what the future holds.  Only that we have bought ourselves much-needed time, to pursue any research that might prevent further catastrophes in the future.  There are no further tasks I can offer you, nor any greater reward I can spare.  We, perhaps all of humanity in the long term, are in your debt.
translation: 好。看到你活生生走进这里，我几乎能感觉到使命已经完成。我不知道这一切缘由何在，也不知道未来会如何。只知道我们为自己争取到了急需的时间，可以去进行任何可能防止未来灾难的研究。我已无法再为你安排其他任务，也无法给予你更大的奖赏。从长远来看，我们，或许整个人类，都欠你一份情。
context:

original: Good.  Those people I worked with were friends of mine.  From what little I understand of what happened out there and what you saw out there, seems like a dogshit way to go out.  Lil payback at least keeps those things from threatening other scavs.  Anyway, things should be just about set up by now.
translation: 很好。与我共事的那些人都是我的朋友。根据我对那里发生情况的有限了解以及你所目击的一切，那真是一种糟糕透顶的死法。至少，小小的报复能让那些东西不再威胁到其他拾荒者。不管怎样，现在一切应该都已经准备就绪了。
context:

translation: 很好。观察，并理解眼前这一切的重要性。刀刃，置于圆圈之内。“让帷幕中的每一处创伤皆为必要之伤，否则勿留痕迹。”为了守护与引导，我承载着他的印记……

He has spoken of driving back the influence of other intrusions upon this realm, of returning the restless dead to their proper state, of paving the way for humanity's survival in the face of adversity.  I do not know if His will is truly out of love for humanity, but even if it isn't, if we are driven to extinction then who would ensure His will is enforced? That much energy would be very dangerous if released in the wrong way, or it was used for destructive purposes, but I figured out a way to make it convert that energy into life force.  A foil to the Sanguine Order's well-established practice of drawing power from life energy, a further side benefit to securing their research I guess.  You'll see for yourself what it does, but it's quite fitting for something meant to mend old wounds.
translation: 那么给你。它的激活方式与守誓者的遗物非常相似，但如果你靠近一个传送门太久，它可能会崩溃，然后这个能量可以用来激活它。如果释放的方式不正确，或者被用于破坏性目的，那么如此大量的能量将非常危险，但我找到了一种方法，可以将这种能量转化为生命力。这是对猩红教派从生命能量中汲取力量的反向运用，对于确保他们的研究而言，这可能是一个额外的好处。你会看到它的作用的，它非常适合用于恢复。

If you accept this, you will have the means to survive that you seek, and you'll be able to do some good with this old relic.
translation: 我恳请你行正义之事。你们教派是如何训诫的？“任何神圣符号或偶像不得左右此道之人。”这是你的抉择，且仅属于你。倘若你接受此议，你将获得你所寻求的生存手段，并能以此古老遗物行善事。

original: I am not alone in this task.  No matter how many deaths my flesh endures, I will carry on my work.  As many times as it takes.  Interesting, however, that you speak as though there are things beyond mortal means, unfazed by the cycle.  The cycle is all-encompassing.  All that may live, whether or not they were ever born, is beholden to this.
translation: 我在这条道路的探索并不孤独。不论我会承受多少死亡，我都要继续履行我的职责，尽可能地。然而有意思的是，你说的话中好像有些超出常人的事物丝毫不受时间的影响。但周期是包罗万象的，所有活着的人，不管他们出生于否，都被包含其中..

original: I am thankful for your offer.  There was another who came by here, once.  I guided them as best as I could, to help me with some unfinished business before I can allow myself to rest, but we have failed once more.  There was a sword, one of our order's holy weapons.  A greatsword with sacred runes engraved along the blade.  If you ever find it again, I will fill you in on what this unfinished business entails.
translation: 我很感谢你的提议。曾经还有一个人来过这里。我尽我所能地引导他，让他在我能让自己归隐前帮我完成我未竟之事，但我们还是失败了。有一把剑丢了，那是一把刻有神圣符文的巨刃，是我们教团的神圣武器之一。如果你能将它找回，我便同你详谈这项未完成之事所需何物。

original: I assume that Sofia or one of her compatriots has asked you to look into this matter.  I recently had to administer the Viaticum to an gravely injured man, the only survivor of an attack a few miles down the road.  They were in too much shock to recount what happened, but I recognized the signs of deep frostbite around the neck and chest, even through his armor, and severe fractures without lacerations or bruises.  Consistent with the other attacks, at night within the same wide range as the others.
translation: 我猜想是索菲亚或她的同伴请你调查此事。最近，我不得不为一名严重受伤的男子施予临终圣事，他是几英里外一次袭击事件中的唯一幸存者。他们因惊吓过度无法讲述发生的事情，但我注意到他们颈部和胸部周围有严重的冻伤迹象，即便透过盔甲也能看出，还有骨折但没有割伤或瘀伤。这与其他袭击一致，都在夜间发生，且发生在同一大范围内。

original: I believe I can now trust you with a more dangerous, yet also more vital, task.  In the past we had few dedicated safehouses, most of us were hosted in the rural homes and churches of our brethren and those they could trust.  Only one place was truly built by our hand, and it suffered the same strange occurrences so many other places suffered during zero hour.  The handful of survivors to flee brought with them tales of living fire and otherworldly horror, warping the very stones underneath the sanctum.  If you believe yourself ready, I would like you to lead a hunt to cleanse it, and take the demon's claws as proof of the hunt.
translation: 我相信我现在可以信任你，让你承担一项更危险、更重要的任务。在过去，我们很少有专门的安全屋，我们中的大多数人都住在农村家庭和兄弟会的教堂里，以及他们可以信任的地方。只有一个地方是真正由我们亲手建造的，它经历了许多其他地方在零小时内所经历的同样的奇怪事件。为数不多的逃难幸存者带来了活生生的火焰和超凡恐怖的故事，扭曲了圣所下面的石头。如果你相信自己准备好了，我希望你带领一场狩猎来净化它，并带回恶魔的爪子作为成功的证明。

original: I can understand why it would be hard to care.  Most of the intruders from Beyond seem as mere animals at best, and most of the others seem to desire nothing but misery and extinction for us all.  But among them all, some spirits, some gods, demons, whatever they may be, would see us survive and endure the dark days ahead of us.  Whether they act in self-interest or not, it's better to have a powerful ally than to cower in the shadows of unnameable horrors.
translation: 我能理解为何对它们难以产生关心。大多数来自彼端的入侵者充其量不过如同野兽一般，而其余大部分似乎只希望我们所有人都陷入痛苦与灭绝。然而，在这众多存在之中，有一些灵魂、神祇、恶魔，无论其究竟为何，会希望我们挺过黑暗的日子，生存下去。不论它们是出于何种私心，有个强大的盟友总比在无名恐怖的阴影中瑟瑟发抖要好得多。

original: I have been working on some efforts to further guard our world against the threats that we are faced with, but I fear it is incomplete.  Regardless, I would be willing to trust it to you, if you are certain they will make good use of it.  Moreover, I know that they seek allies.  My time as a Keeper has long passed, but I could do what I can to guide those who come here, that they may find the right place.
translation: 我一直在致力于采取更多措施来保护我们的世界免受威胁，但我担心这项工作尚未完成。即便如此，如果你们确信他们会妥善利用它，我愿意将其托付给你们。此外，我知道他们正在寻求盟友。虽然我作为守誓者的时代早已过去，但我仍会竭尽所能引导来到这里的人们，帮助他们找到正确的方向。

original: I have good news and bad news.  The good news is that we've made contact with a group of our brethren, and they are expected to arrive soon.  The bad news is they've reported something else has been attracted to this area by our wards, stalking the surrounding woods due to the magic itself deterring it.  It may be a threat to travelers, in addition to potentially endangering our comrades while they're en route.  I would like to request you scout the area and, if need be, slay the creature.
translation: 我有好消息和坏消息。好消息是，我们已经与我们的兄弟取得了联系，他们很快就会到达。坏消息是，他们报告说，由于我们的结界，另一些东西也被吸引到了这片地区，正在潜伏周围的树林，但由于魔法本身的作用，它无法靠近。这可能对路人造成危险，而且可能会在我们的同伴前往途中危及他们的安全。我想请求你勘察一下这个地区，如果有必要，杀死那个生物。

I'll send off the debriefing summary, but I doubt that will be enough to help.  There is a lot going on lately, keep asking around and maybe you can do something with all that intel.
translation: 我收到了多起袭击的报告，我想你是在替别人追查原因吧？我很想帮忙，但我们现在人力实在有限。目前我只能调配资源去调查我们巡逻队最近遭遇的一次袭击，而那起事件无疑符合你所说的“异常”特征。我会把简报总结发送过去，但恐怕仅凭这些还不足以解决问题。最近事态纷繁复杂，你们得多方打听，或许能从这些情报中找到线索。

I'd rather focus on the task at hand, for now.

original: I need to do something discreet for me, if you could.  The locals here are still a bit reluctant to work with us, and I can understand why.  Personally, I just want to go about my duties here as best as I'm able, and I think the best way to keep my superiors from causing trouble would be if I provided them with information that'd give them good reason to work with this place, instead of working against them.  I have something in mind that'd kill two birds with one stone, as it were.  If you can provide me with a copy of their medical text, History of Alchemy, I'll be able to better treat people here, not to mention it'll give me a bargaining chip to keep things a bit more civil between the locals and my superiors.
translation: 我想请你帮我做一件私事。这里的当地人仍然有点不愿意和我们合作，我能理解原因。我个人只想在这里尽我所能履行职责，我认为防止上级惹麻烦的最好办法是给他们提供充分的理由来与这个地方合作，而不是与之对抗。我有一个一石二鸟的计划。如果你能给我一份他们的医学文献《炼金术史》，我将能更好地治疗这里的人们，同时也能作为筹码，让当地人和我的上级之间的关系稍微缓和一点。

original: I suspect it is you who does not understand.  This is understandable, but this is why I offer you this chance to learn the verses the bones seek to sing.  I know not of what you called it, but this is not a thing of blood.  Blood is an impure thing, far too transient to offer worthy songs.  It is shed wantonly, and does not hold the permanence that bones carry with them.
translation: 我怀疑你不明白，但这是可以被理解的，这就是为什么我给你这个机会来学习骨头所吟唱的诗歌。我不知道你怎样称呼它，但都不是像血液这样的东西。血液是一种不纯之物，如烟云般短暂，无法谱写任何诗词。它的变化随意且混乱，不像骨头那般永恒。

translation: 我想我有主意了。我认得这里提到的一个地方。我曾在一个地方短暂工作过。它们是一种加工中心，因此这些货物中有很大一部分要经过这里。

original: I think I see the problem.  Let me guess, quit the Order, found religion, and now the Keepers' little friend is pulling your strings?  "No god, no demon, no spirit can be trusted with power over you."  You've compromised your principles, friend.
translation: 我想我看出问题所在了。让我猜猜，你退出了教会，找到了新的信仰，现在守誓者的那个小东西在操控你？“不论是神、恶魔还是精灵，都不应被赋予控制你的权力。”你违背了自己的原则，朋友。

original: I tracked their movements for some time intermittently, along with keeping tabs on other leads.  No sign of contact with any remainder of the Keepers, but they have been involved in anomalous activity within the past month prior to the beginning of all this.  I will trust you to retrieve any intel as you see fit given your connection to their order, but do exercise caution.
translation: 我断断续续地追踪了他们一段时间的行踪，同时密切关注其他线索。没有任何迹象表明他们与其他守誓者有任何联系，但在这一切开始之前的一个月内，他们已经参与了异常活动。我相信你会发现一些信息，因为你与他们的雇佣关系，但一定要谨慎。

original: I tracked their movements for some time intermittently, along with keeping tabs on other leads.  No sign of contact with any remainder of the Keepers, but they have been involved in anomalous activity within the past month prior to the beginning of all this.  Keep your guard up, and deal with them as needed if they seem unlikely to cooperate.  We can't afford to let this intel slip out of our grasp.
translation: 我断断续续地追踪了他们一段时间的行踪，同时密切关注其他线索。没有任何迹象表明他们与其他守誓者有任何联系，但在这一切开始之前的一个月内，他们已经参与了异常活动。保持警惕，如果他们似乎不太可能合作，就根据需要处理他们。我们不能让这个情报从我们手中溜走。

original: I tracked their movements for some time intermittently, along with keeping tabs on other leads.  No sign of person contact with the remainder of the Keepers, but they were overtly been involved in anomalous activity within the past month prior to the beginning of all this.  I will trust you to retrieve any intel as you see fit given your connection to their order, but do exercise caution.
translation: 我曾断断续续地追踪他们的行踪，并关注其他线索。没有发现他们与剩余守誓者有过接触的迹象，但在这一切开始前的一个月内，他们明显参与了异常活动。考虑到你与他们教团的联系，我相信你会在你认为合适的情况下根据需要获取情报，但请务必小心行事。

original: I tracked their movements for some time intermittently, along with keeping tabs on other leads.  No sign of person contact with the remainder of the Keepers, but they were overtly been involved in anomalous activity within the past month prior to the beginning of all this.  Keep your guard up, and deal with them as needed if they seem unlikely to cooperate.  We can't afford to let this intel slip out of our grasp.
translation: 我断断续续地跟踪了他们一段时间的行动，并密切关注其他线索。没有发现他们与剩余的守护者有过直接接触，但在这一切开始前的一个月内，他们明显参与了异常活动。保持警惕，如果他们看起来不愿配合，就按需处理。我们不能让这些情报从手中溜走。

original: I understand that this may seem like a trivial thing, and an odd request.  But this ritual is more important to us than you realize.
translation: 我明白这在你看来可能是个微不足道且古怪的要求，但这个仪式对我们而言比你想象的更重要。

translation: 我明白。亵渎古老神庙的威胁不容小觑。如果我觉得自己能完成这趟旅程，我会亲自去尝试。即便失败，我也能死而无憾，因为我做了正确的事情。如果你改变主意，随时来寻求我的指引。

translation: 我明白。即便在这里，也有许多事情要做。我怀疑我会比预期忙碌得更久，所以如果你有机会，请来找我。我能提供的并不多，但我会尽力筹集一些东西回报你。

original: I was what we called an "arcane purifier" before all this started.  Nothing but a fancy way of saying we investigated anomalies in areas where the regular hunters wouldn't exactly blend in.  Technically purifiers were just the ones focused on research and getting in touch with people, with others doing the exciting work.  But, just as the smiths and medics are still part of a hunting party, the title gets around.
translation: 在这一切开始之前，我就已经是人们所说的“奥术净化者”了。这只是一种花哨的称呼，因为我们调查了那些普通猎人完全无法对付的异常地区。技术性的净化者是那些专注于研究、和与人们沟通交流的家伙，而其他人则做一些令人激动的工作。但是，正如连铁匠和医生们也都是狩猎队的一员，这个头衔也流传开来。

Couldn't get any reception, I thought maybe it was because we were in a fairly rural area.  Right as we were arguing over why we might not be getting any signal, one of the others yells out for a mask check.
translation: 我和几个同伴在一起。我们正前往一个预定的汇合点与另一支狩猎队伍会合，其中一人带了手机。但是手机没有信号，我当时以为是因为我们处在比较偏僻的地区。正当我们争论为什么没有信号的时候，其中一人突然喊了一声“检查面具”。

original: I wish we could spare the people for every settlement out there, but we're stretched dangerously thin as it is.  Not to mention, that's for the higher-ups to decide.  If things weren't so hectic in this region, I might be able talk them into committing more personnel, but I'm not sure how easy it'll be.
translation: 我多么希望我们能为每个定居点提供人力支援，但目前我们的资源已经极度紧张。更不用说，这需要高层来决定。如果不是这个地区情况如此混乱，我或许可以尝试说服他们投入更多人员，但现在我不确定这有多容易。

original: I would be reluctant to describe it as supernatural or any such, but anomalous is perhaps appropriate.  Indeed, recent information suggests that there may be a new rash of attacks by some unknown xenoforms.  I haven't had the opportunity to gather extensive data on this, but I did recently discuss something with my superiors regarding a recent patrol fending off creatures that don't fit the usual patterns.  I'll relay that information to your benefactors, I guess.
translation: 我并不愿意将其描述为超自然或其他类似的现象，但用“异常”这个词来形容或许较为恰当。事实上，最近的信息表明可能有一股新的未知外星生物正在发起攻击。我还没机会收集关于此事的详细数据，但最近确实与我的上级讨论了一次巡逻队击退不符合常见模式的生物的情况。我想我会将这一信息转告给你的资助者。

I'm afraid at my age, all I can manage is to study the Beyond and tend to my books.  They are correct to send you however, as I do have what they seek preserved in clay, to better preserve it.  I'm afraid that is all I can do for the people who sent you.  You may have it.

original: I'm ashamed to admit, if not for Johnathan I wouldn't have learned anything had happened.  I knew a bit of rumors, riots and other concerning things, but nothing firsthand.  Personally I'm still half-convinced the Sanguine Order was somehow involved, but it's not worth pointing fingers anymore.  I'd rather focus on the task at hand, for now.
translation: 我得惭愧地承认，如果不是约翰纳森告知，我还不知发生了什么事。我也曾听说过一些流言蜚语，什么暴动和其他令人不安的事情，但全都是道听途说。私底下，我仍半信半疑地认为“猩红教派”与此事脱不了干系，但如今再指责任何人已无济于事。我宁愿将注意力集中在当前的任务上。

original: Implanted in one arm is a device that weaponizes kinetic energy through anomalous means.  When deployed, it can give your punches a powerful knockback effect while amplifying damage and armor penetration.  It comes with the side effect of your punches sometimes giving off a blinding flashbang effect.
translation: 一只手臂内植入了一款通过异常手段将动能武器化的装置。启用后，它能使你的拳击具备强大的击退效果，同时增强伤害和护甲穿透力。副作用是你的拳击有时会产生致盲闪光弹效果。

original: In its original state, it could manipulate and control the instabilities that now linger in this realm, not just seal them.  There were many rituals this could be used for, but even if this was an option, they require years of training to practice safely.  We shall have to make do with what remains of the purpose it can serve.
translation: 在其原始状态下，它能够操纵并控制现在仍在这个领域中存在的不稳定性，而不仅仅局限于封印它们。这件物品可用于许多仪式，但即使这些仪式是可选项，也需要数年的训练才能安全实践。因此，我们只能充分利用它现存所能发挥的功能。

translation: 确实如此。他们称之为执政官的东西，若在现世站稳脚跟，可能会让我们所有人都面临更多危险，而人类现有的威胁已经够多了。

original: Indeed there were.  Seven sacrifices, seven gifts from He From Beyond The Veil… left in the care of seven high priests.  They were to use these to serve His will, to prevent the wounds in The Veil from worsening.  We failed in that.
translation: 的确如此。来自帷幕彼端的祂给予了七项祭品，分别托付给七位大祭司保管。他们本应用这些祭品来遵从祂的意志，防止帷幕上的裂口进一步恶化。然而我们在这件事上失败了。
context:

original: Indeed, I wish the magus would permit us to work together instead.  My master would greatly value what you've learned.  But you'd be considered a threat.
translation: 确实如此，我希望魔术师能允许我们共同合作。我的主人会对你所学的知识极为重视。但你恐怕会被视为一种威胁。

original: Indeed.  Before the founding, we were a local religious institute under solemn vow.  I suspect the Church would frown upon our present conduct, our practices now so closely entwined with our heathen brethren.
translation: 的确，在学院成立前，我们是在当地庄严宣誓过的。我怀疑教会会对我们现在的行为不以为然，我们现在的行为与我们的异教徒兄弟紧密相连。
context:
ID: TALK_CF_GM_GRANDMASTER
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/Arcana/npcs/TALK_CF_GM.json
类型为 talk_topic

WIKI:
https://onetwo.ren/CDDA-Kenan-Modpack-Chinese/#Arcana→talk_topic→TALK_CF_GM_GRANDMASTER

original: Indeed.  Despite it all, there is still hope.  Hope not just for the survival of humanity or our faith, but that our deeds will please Him, and ensure it hasn't all been in vain.  Thank you.
translation: 确实如此。尽管面临重重困难，仍然存在着希望。这希望不仅仅是关乎人类的存续或是我们的信仰，更是期盼我们的行动能取悦于祂，确保这一切并非徒劳无功。谢谢你。
context:
ID: TALK_HERMIT_VEIL_SOLIDARITY
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/Arcana/npcs/TALK_HERMIT.json
类型为 talk_topic

https://onetwo.ren/CDDA-Kenan-Modpack-Chinese/#Arcana→talk_topic→TALK_HERMIT_VEIL_SOLIDARITY

original: Indeed.  Hopefully you have seen for yourself what this relic can do, even in the poor state it's in.  With it, another can at least continue to fulfill our oath.  To do all we can to ensure this world is not cast into the abyss, and others with it.  If you believe yourself ready…
translation: 的确。希望你亲眼看到这个遗迹能做些什么，即使是在它所处的贫困状态下。有了它，另一个人至少可以继续履行我们的誓言。尽我们所能确保这个世界不会被抛入深渊，其他人也不会因此而陷入深渊。如果你相信自己准备好了…
context:
ID: TALK_HERMIT_DISCUSS_3
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/Arcana/npcs/TALK_HERMIT.json
类型为 talk_topic

https://onetwo.ren/CDDA-Kenan-Modpack-Chinese/#Arcana→talk_topic→TALK_HERMIT_DISCUSS_3

original: Indeed.  I know a possible way you could help.  I don't have many exact locations of attacks to narrow things down, but I do have the location of a related incident.  Some survivors made camp after dealing with attacks from these monsters, and I suspect they left behind anomalous findings that might help us locate them.  You seem to have an eye for this, I'd like to ask for you to investigate.
translation: 的确。我知道你可以帮上忙。我没有多少确切的袭击地点来缩小范围，但我有一个相关事件的地点。一些幸存者在应对这些怪物的攻击后扎营，我怀疑他们留下的异常发现可能有助于我们找到他们。你似乎有眼力，我想请你调查一下。
context:

original: Indeed.  It's recent enough that, with the right means, one can sense such disturbances while they are fresh.  Be prepared for whatever monsters may have followed from these wounds in The Veil.
translation: 的确。最近，只要有正确的手段，人们就可以在新的时候感觉到这种干扰。准备好迎接任何怪物可能从帷幕上的伤口中走出来。
context:

original: Indeed.  There are still concerns that the fabric of The Veil may still be unstable and vulnerable to new anomalies, and the potential for otherworldly monsters being attracted to this place.  Same method by which we safeguarded our sanctums, until most of them were overwhelmed the day everything boiled over.
translation: 确实如此。 人们仍然担心面纱的结构可能依旧不稳定，容易受到新的异常现象的影响，以及其他世界的怪物被吸引到这里来的可能性。 我们也是用同样的方法来保护我们的圣殿的，直到大部分圣殿在一切沸腾的那天被淹没。

original: Interesting, but transient and fleeting as songs of flesh are.  Even if it is at once stout and echoing like songs of stone, yet carries the melody living flesh possesses, I do not think it would last as the melodies of bone do.  Even if I did wish to learn its song, I feel you may find more use for it than I would.  It would not be right to ask you to part with this thing.
translation: 有趣，但如同肉体之歌一般短暂易逝。即便它如石之歌般坚实回荡，又兼具鲜活血肉所拥有的旋律，我认为它仍无法像骨之歌那样长久留存。即使我真有心学习它的歌谣，我感觉你或许比我更能善用它。让你割舍此物实属不妥。

Use the power that this act grants you, and you will see for yourself what follows.  You will know when the full fruit of this effort has been rewarded, seek me out when this has occurred.

translation: 这件工作最好由你自己独立完成，我没法为你做些什么。但我可以提供建议和某种程度的帮助。你需要的主要东西是祂的圣言，《圣杯誓言》。你还需要参考《猩红法典》来破译最初的咒语。

original: It is not that your form has strayed from the natural path.  It is the fact that these influences make your body dependent on forces that do not belong in this world.  If you are bound to the enemy, then there is a risk that your life will depend on their continued influence on this world.  We will never be able to truly reverse the damage that has been done, but mending our world might be a grave risk to those too closely tied to the Beyond.
translation: 问题不在于你的形态偏离了自然的轨迹。而在于这些影响让你的身体依赖于不属于这个世界的力量。如果你与敌人为伍，那么你的生命就有可能依赖于他们对这个世界的持续影响。我们永远无法真正逆转已成的损害，但修复我们的世界可能对那些与彼端紧密相连的人来说是个重大的风险。

Something in the water evidently, and my rough guess is that caused the rioting and undead at minimum.  No guesses beyond that, though.  I only knew a bit of the news due to having been fairly new to the Order.

original: It still has some lingering aftereffects.  Like a trail of energy burnt into what remains of its enchantments, essentially pointing in the direction of the source as of the moment it activated.  That'd be no good to us just standing here, but we know the rough area of the anomalous region, and we know where it was when it activated.  Go tell Johnathan we have what we need to pinpoint the source.
translation: 它仍然有一些挥之不去的后遗症。就像一条能量的轨迹燃烧到它的附魔残余部分，基本上是指向源头的方向，从它激活的那一刻起。站在这里对我们没有好处，但我们知道异常区域的粗糙区域，我们知道它激活时的位置。去告诉Johnathan我们有找到来源所需的东西。

What it does is seal nearby breaches, helping stabilize the fabric of the Veil.  After all that's happened, it's not going to solve everything but it's an improvement.
translation: 它使用了与Kairos项目相同的基本概念，即操纵和封闭裂痕，结合了守护者和血魔知识，了解如何操纵面纱。它的作用是封闭附近的裂缝，有助于稳定失控的结构。尽管发生了这么多事情，虽然它不能解决所有问题，但也是一个进步。

All the better to adapt and survive.  Still caught us a bit off-guard all the same, you don't just wake up one day and say "today is the day it finally happens" or anything like that.
translation: 这不是什么超自然现象，这一点我们很确定。 骑士团怀疑麻烦正在酝酿，而我们已经为了更好地适应和生存准备了几十年了 。但这还是让我们有点措手不及，你不可能一觉醒来就说 "今天，这一切终于发生了"之类的话。

If you bring me 1 crystallized essence, I can imprint this knowledge upon you.
translation: 这是一个反击法术，当您遭受攻击时，会如同广为人知的“暗影之盾”那样反击敌人。它并非直接对攻击者造成伤害，而是将对方瞬间推离您一段距离。当它启动时，也会对附近任何足够接近的威胁产生同样效果。如果您能提供一块璀璨源质，我可以将此知识烙印给您。

original: It's just as I thought.  The culmination of several different research facilities, a project to bring these pieces together, and a very faint aura to it.  They did a lot of testing with the machinery they built, didn't they?  That helps us too.  I'm sorry, this a lot for me to take in and analyze, but we can discuss the importance of what you found later if you wish.
translation: 正如我想的那样。这个项目是几个不同的研究设施的最终结果，它将这些碎片组合在了一起，却只产生了一个微弱的光环。他们用他们制造的机器做了很多测试，不是吗？这对我们也有帮助。我很抱歉，这对我来说是也是很难理解和分析的，但是如果你愿意的话，我们可以稍后再讨论你发现的东西的重要性。

original: It's just as I thought.  The culmination of several different research facilities, a project to bring these pieces together, and a very faint aura to it.  They did a lot of testing with the machinery they built, didn't they?  That helps us too.  This a lot for me to take in and analyze, give me about three days and I should have some results you might be interested in taking a look at.  In the meantime, if you have any questions I'll see what I can answer.
translation: 正如我所想的那样。这是几个不同研究机构的成果,一个将这些碎片整合在一起的项目,还有一个非常微弱的气场。他们用他们建造的机器做了很多测试,不是吗?这也对我们有帮助。这对我来说要消化和分析的东西太多了,给我三天时间,我应该会有一些你可能会感兴趣的结果。同时,如果你有任何问题,我会尽我所能回答。

original: Just gotta keep pushing your luck, huh?  Well alright, if that's all you're after, I don't like dealing in rumors but this sounds like serious shit.  You hear stupid stories from drunk survivors all the time, only one I'd put stock in comes from one of the more experienced fellows, who said she had a run-in with a ghost or some shit. Out by the river.  Had a freezer burn on the back of her hand, couple hairline fractures too.  If she wasn't stone-cold sober, and one of the few scavengers I can trust not to bullshit me, I wouldn't have given her story a second thought.
translation: 你得继续努力，哈？好吧，如果这就是你想要的，我不喜欢处理谣言，但这听起来很严重。你经常听到醉酒幸存者的愚蠢故事，只有一个故事是来自一个更有经验的家伙，她说她和鬼魂或是什么东西发生了冲突。在河边。她的手背被冰柜烫伤，还有几处发际骨折。如果她不是一个彻头彻尾的清醒的人，而且是我可以信任的少数不会胡扯我的拾荒者之一，我就不会再考虑她的故事了。

I'll let you decide what to do if we meet anyone here, I don't know if the other dreams will do us much good.  At least trying to make sense of them, seeing these places in person made me feel, I don't know, better.  Less uneasy.  Thank you.
translation: 看起来像是那个地方。我能看到房子有人住的迹象。尽管这是我第一次在清醒的世界里看到它，但它看起来还是那么的亲切。也许梦是对未来的憧憬，如果是这样的话，我猜是关于在这里旅行，而不仅仅是一个预兆或其他什么。如果我们在这里遇到任何人，我会让你决定怎么做，我不知道其他的梦是否会对我们有多大好处。至少想弄清楚这些地方，亲眼看到这些地方让我感觉，我不知道，感觉好多了。不那么不安。非常感谢。
context:

original: Lost half a hunting party a few days ago, along the edge of one of the old towns.  Thought nothing of it at first, but now that you mention it things sounded fishy.  Guess I'll lay out how things went down, see if that helps whatever you're trying to do.
translation: 几天前，在一个古老城镇的边缘，失去了一半的狩猎队。一开始什么都没想，但现在你提到了，事情听起来有点可疑。我想我会把事情的进展情况告诉你，看看这是否有助于你的努力。

original: Materials used to make these items are commonly wrested from beasts such as what other survivors call "grackens" as well as "krecks" which have been seen lingering near tears in reality, or lurking near the remains of slain soldiers and other groups.  Abominations some have termed hunting horrors and flying polyps may also be a source, though more dangerous.
translation: 制作这些物品所用的材料通常是从野兽身上夺取的，比如其他幸存者所说的“格拉肯”以及“克雷克”，它们常被看到徘徊在现实的裂缝附近，或者潜伏在被杀死的士兵和其他群体的遗骸附近。一些人将之称为狩猎恐怖和飞行波洛普的怪物也可能是一个来源，尽管更危险。

original: Materials used to make these items are commonly wrested from beasts such as what other survivors call "grackens" as well as "krecks" which have been seen lingering near tears in reality, or lurking near the remains of slain soldiers and other groups.  Abominations some have termed hunting horrors and flying polyps may also be a source, though more dangerous. Some of the undead, most prominantly the ones contorting into predatory forms and those gaining a boney appearance, have been known to yield such materials as well.  Even some living beings afflicted by mutation, even some poor souls twisted by inhuman influence, could display anomalous properties that would linger in their bodies well after death
translation: 这些物品所用的材料通常是从野兽身上获得的，例如被幸存者们称之为“格拉肯”和“克雷克”的野兽，它们常常出现在现实裂缝附近或潜伏在被杀死的士兵或其他团体的遗体附近。一些人也认为可以从被称为恐怖狩猎者和多角飞行兽的可怕生物获取这些材料，尽管它们更加危险。一些亡灵，特别是那些扭曲成捕食形态和骨头的亡灵，也被发现会产生这样的材料。甚至一些受到突变影响的生命，甚至一些被非人类影响扭曲的可怜灵魂，都可能展现出在其死后仍然停留在体内的异常属性。

original: May He From Beyond The Veil guide us both.  I will do what I can to direct you towards letting the relic serve its purpose.  Failing that, there are methods to sustain this power, to be found within the pages of Oaths To The Chalice.  Some of what you will see are common, trifling things.  Others are wonders only He can bestow, and they may yet serve you well.  When the time comes and you have seen the fruit of your labor, speak to me again.
translation: 愿帷幕彼端的祂指引我们。我会尽我所能指导你让这件文物发挥作用。如果不能做到这一点，就有一些方法来维持这种力量，可以在圣杯誓言中找到。你会看到一些普通的，琐碎的东西。其他人是只有上帝才能赐予的奇迹，它们可能会很好地为你服务。到了时候，你们看见你们劳碌的果子，就再对我说话。

original: May Odin grant you victory in battle, should it come to that.  Any creature attracted by our defensive magic is likely to be not only otherworldly, but tied to other mystic forces.  Expect trouble.  I will permit you the assistance of one of our brethren if you deem it necessary, but we cannot spare the forces needed for a proper hunt.
translation: 愿奥丁在战斗中给你胜利，如果真是这样的话。任何被我们的防御魔法所吸引的生物可能不仅是超凡脱俗的，而且与其他神秘力量有联系。期待麻烦。如果你认为有必要的话，我会允许你帮助我们的一个兄弟，但我们不能为一个适当的狩猎腾出必要的力量。

original: Most of our order had little familiarity with these laboratories.  If we knew then what we knew now, we would've tried to force our way into every last one of them.  I do, however, recall that site was the subject of an investigation by one of our urban contacts, a Purifier like Nicholas.  Shortly before all this boiled over.
translation: 我们订单上的大多数人对这些实验室都不熟悉。要是早知如此，我们肯定会用自己的手段逼迫他们。然而，我确实记得这个网站是我们的一个像尼古拉斯一样的净化者的城镇联系人的调查对象。至少在爆发前不久是这样的。

original: Most of them will be fresh meat, armed with whatever weapons they were able to scavenge.  Their leader will be dangerous, single them out and pick them off if you get a chance.  Try to drop whoever's keeping watch before they can raise the alarm.  And if you see one of them geared up like they were actually prepared for a proper fight, focus on them immediately.  That's most likely a sanguine shrike.
translation: 他们中的大多数将是新鲜的肉，装备着他们能够清除的任何武器。他们的领导人会很危险，如果你有机会，把他们挑出来，把他们干掉。在他们发出警报之前，试着把看守的人放下。如果你看到他们中的一个准备好了，好像他们真的准备好了一场正式的战斗，那么立刻关注他们。那很可能是一名猩红教派的屠猎者。

There's a group of survivors who knew Father Alexander currently sheltering there, and they likely will be have work to be done too.  I could direct you there if you'd like, in case you wish to visit them yourself.

original: Not long after I got here I took an interest in the sorts of things the locals collected.  Truth is, early on when shit hit the fan I picked up a few books and some other experience with all this strangeness.  Not much, but enough to keep me another day away from dying.  I used to help tend to crops, these new experiences and some of the weird creatures I've seen gave me an idea for something that might improve crop yields.  Interested?
translation: 我到这儿不久就对当地人收集的东西产生了兴趣。事实是，在大便砸到电扇的时候，我就买了几本书和一些其他的经历。不多，但足以让我再过一天就死了。我曾经帮助照料庄稼，这些新的经验和我见过的一些奇怪的生物给了我一个想法，可以提高作物产量。有兴趣吗？

original: Not many holdouts large enough to call a settlement, but there is activity out there at least.  We have our own work on getting something set up.  There's also a small group that occasionally sends traders to visit us, they're holed up in some old rural church.  The church's deacon stops by here fairly often though, should be out in the hallway.  Talk to him and he might be able to give you directions.
translation: 没有多少人坚持到可以达成和解，但至少在那里有活动。我们有自己的工作来安排一些事情。还有一个小团体，偶尔会派商人来拜访我们，他们躲在一个古老的乡村教堂里。教堂的执事经常来这里，应该在走廊里。跟他谈谈，他也许能给你指路。

original: Now that we have a few more helping hands around here, we can dedicate more time to following up on some leads Johnathan's notes have provided us.  They point to evidence of a survivor among the Keepers of The Oath, who had close contact with members of their high priesthood.  I would like you to find out anything you can from them, any research or assistance they may be able to provide.
translation: 现在我们有更多的帮手在这里，我们可以花更多的时间来跟进Johnathan的笔记提供给我们的一些线索。他们指出，在守誓者中有一名幸存者，与他们的高级祭司有密切接触。我希望你能从他们那里找到任何你能得到的东西，他们可能提供的任何研究或帮助。

original: Now that you mention it, yes.  A few days ago one of the scavengers came in with a severe injury, described a strange creature that attacked him while on his way to rendezvous with a few others.  I can relay where it happened I guess.  Very odd too, a three-inch section of his forearm suffered from fourth-degree frostbite, down to the tendons, and both the radius and ulna had a complete transverse fracture in that area.  We had no choice but to amputate, I'm afraid…
translation: 既然你提到了，是的。几天前，一个拾荒者进来时受了重伤，描述了一个奇怪的生物在他与其他几个人会合的路上袭击了他。我想我可以把事情发生的地方转告给你。非常奇怪的是，他的前臂有一个三英寸长的部分遭受了四度冻伤，一直到肌腱，桡骨和尺骨在这个区域都有一个完整的横向骨折。我们别无选择只能截肢，恐怕…

original: Our order was composed of people from various religions.  Not only Abrahamic ones of various sorts, but those that would be considered pagan.  Asatruan, in my case.  Over time our practices mingled, a shared influence affecting our approach to the arcane.
translation: 我们的教团成员来自诸多不同的宗教信仰，不仅包括各类亚伯拉罕宗教（三大宗教起源），也涵盖了那些被视为异教的信仰体系。就我个人而言，我信奉的是阿斯图鲁教（斯堪的纳维亚诸神信仰）。随着时间推移，我们的宗教实践相互交融，共同的影响塑造了我们对奥术的认知与处理方式。

Patches of cloth steeped in an alchemical mixture, forming a poultice that refines and focuses its effects. original: Perhaps.  It is hard to be certain of gods, earthly or otherworldly.  No doubt other powerful beings from Beyond have no such concern, but is it because they believe there will be no such consequences, or are they ignorant of them?  Or worse, eager to see what havoc may afflict other planes of existence?  These are questions no mortal mind can answer with certainty, only that at least one of these powers has an interest in deeds that benefit us, no matter His true intent.
translation: 确实如此。无论是尘世还是异界的神祇，其真伪确难定论。无疑，来自彼岸的其他强大力量对此或许毫不在意，但这究竟是因为他们坚信不会有任何后果，还是他们对此一无所知？抑或是，他们甚至热切期待着目睹这混乱如何波及其它存在的领域？这些问题，凡人的智慧无法给出确切答案，我们所能确定的仅是至少有一位这样的力量对有利于我们的行动抱有兴趣，不论其真实动机为何。
